node.content-desc: Tricky Tripper is an offline-compatible utility for managing travel expenses. It is especially intended for holidays with shared expenses, e.g. you go on a trip with your friends and from time to time one companion pays for all travelers. In such a situation Tricky Tripper splits the costs among the companions as you want it. The application calculates all debts among the travelers and offers means to get even, during or after the trip.
Even or individual splitting of costs among travelers.
Even or individual splitting of costs among travelers.
Contact access is required only for autocompletion of the travellers' names.
Contact access is required only for autocompletion of the travellers' names.
Write access to the storage directory is required for the data export only.
Write access to the storage directory is required for the data export only.
Internet access is only required for downloading exchange rates.
Internet access is only required for downloading exchange rates.
Tricky Tripper's typical usage scenario is:
You add companions to your trip.
You add companions to your trip.
You go on your trip and you track every payment with more than one cost participant with the help of Tricky Tripper.
You go on your trip and you track every payment with more than one cost participant with the help of
Debts among travelers are settled during or after the trip.
Debts among travelers are settled during or after the trip.
After your trip, Tricky Tripper informs you about the total spending and about who owes what amount to whom.
informs you about the total spending and about who owes what amount to whom.

Wiping from the left or alternativelly tabbing onto the burger button in the upprt left corner reveals the Manage trips dialog, allowing you to create, edit and delete trips. A long-tap on a trip entry offers functions to delete/edit in the menu.
Add travel companions to your trip
In Tricky Tripper travel companions are calledTravelers. A traveler can be added to your trip with the menu function Person+ on the primary tab dialogs.
A Long-Tap on a traveler on the Travelers-Tab reveals various menu functions referring to him/her. Edit allows you to edit the name of the selected traveler.
Tap one of those travelers on theTravelers-Tab, who is going to pay the money (Alternatively select Create Payment from the context menu.)

Note: Money transfers cannot be edited but only deleted.

The debts are also displayed on the Money transfer dialog, i.e. the place where you can settle debts.
On the Travelers-Tab, long-tab on the traveler who's debts are to be settled.
-Tab, long-tab on the traveler who's debts are to be settled.
Choose the function Money transfer which opens the Money transfer dialog: It allows you to settle the debts by money transfer of the debt amount to the creditor of the debts.
dialog: It allows you to settle the debts by money transfer of the debt amount to the creditor of the debts.
Note: A Money transfer is equally to lending money in case that a transferring traveler transfers an amount bigger than the amount he owes to the target of a transfer.
Choose the Export function from the action bar on one of the major tabs to open up the Export dialog.
function from the action bar on one of the major tabs to open up the Export dialog.
